metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8378 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-628. A heap-based buffer over-readexists in AP4_BitStream::ReadBytes() in Codecs/Ap4BitStream.cpp, a similarissue to CVE-2017-14645. It can be triggered by sending a crafted file tothe aac2mp4 binary. It allows an attacker to cause a Denial of Service(Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
